text: Mikroglottika - An International Journal of Minority Languages Philologies,Its ISSN is 1998-0863. is a language scientific magazine about minority languages. The word Mikroglottika means minority language studies. It encourages studies about minority languages philology, as phonology, syntax, lexicon and related topics. It is edited by Peter Lang in Germany. Teachers from Universities of several European countries also contribute. Its Yearbook 2008 has content about these languages: * Basque * German * Leonese * Luxemburgian * Ukrainian ==References== ==Other websites== * Mikroglottika web site Category:Linguistics journals Category:German language Category:Leonese language
